vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Gomerians living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.3;
son of: Gomer (H1586);
brother of: Riphath (H7384A) and Togarmah (H8425)
§ Ashchenaz or Ashkenaz = "a man as sprinkled: fire as scattered"
1) a descendant of Japheth
2) a northern people, perhaps of Bithynia
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Gómer; descendiente de Jafet; ancestro de [b.]; (b)   región y pueblo; Armenia
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞實基拿 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "像灑落的雨滴般的人: 撒落般的火"
1) 雅弗的後裔 ( #創 10:3;代上1:6| )
2) 一個北方的民族, 可能是俾斯尼亞(在小亞細亞西北, 濱黑海的一個古國) (耶51:27)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚实基拿 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "像洒落的雨滴般的人: 撒落般的火"
1) 雅弗的后裔 ( #创 10:3;代上1:6| )
2) 一个北方的民族, 可能是俾斯尼亚(在小亚细亚西北, 滨黑海的一个古国) (耶51:27)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Ashchenaz or Ashkenaz = "a man as sprinkled: fire as scattered"
This name is used for:
1) a descendant of Japheth
2) a northern people, perhaps of Bithynia
